title: Medical Laboratory Assistant
requirements:
• Perform laboratory assays and duties as required.
• HND/B.Sc in Laboratory Science.
• 5–7 years experience as a Laboratory Manager.
• Must have worked as a Medical Laboratory Scientist.
• Strong leadership and organizational skills.
• Effective communication.
responsibilities:
• Manage daily operations of the centre.
• Handle pre-analytical, analytical and post-analytical processes.
• Ensure quality control adherence.
• Recommend and implement process improvements.
• Assist with improving turnaround time.

title: UX Specialist
requirements:
• Degree in Computer Science, IT, Design, or related field.
• 1–3 years experience in UX design or research.
• Strong knowledge of user-centered design.
• Experience with Figma.
• Ability to analyze user behaviour and test designs.
• Portfolio or case studies required.
• Active sports-betting user.
• Strong communication and teamwork.
responsibilities:
• Conduct interviews, surveys, and usability tests.
• Analyze user behaviour and competitor apps.
• Create wireframes, flows, and prototypes.
• Propose localized product improvements.
• Present UX solutions to stakeholders.
• Support continuous UX testing.
• Collaborate with the Nigeria-based UXR team.

title: Video Editor (YouTube + Social Media)
requirements:
• Skilled with Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut, etc.
• Good pacing, jump cuts, subtitles, and retention editing.
• Basic motion graphics is an advantage.
• Reliable and deadline-driven.
• Strong creativity and communication.
• Must provide 3 video samples.
responsibilities:
• Edit 1–2 high-quality YouTube videos weekly.
• Convert long-form videos to short-form content.
• Add captions, motion graphics, transitions.
• Follow brand guidelines.
• Collaborate on ideas and virality angles.
